00047 [scriptable, uuid(d730af19-1b0b-4679-9f22-b41caa4ec59a)]
00048 interface sbIServicePaneNode : nsISupports
00049 {
00050   /* \brief the uri of this node as an RDF resource */
00051   readonly attribute nsIRDFResource resource;
00052   
00053   /* \brief the uri of this node as a string */
00054   readonly attribute AString id;
00055   
00056   /* \brief can this node have children */
00057   readonly attribute boolean isContainer;
00058   
00059   /* \brief the URL to load when the node is clicked on in the tree */
00060   attribute AString url;
00061   /* \brief the URL of the image to display in the tree */
00062   attribute AString image;
00063   /* \brief the name to display in the tree */
00064   attribute AString name;
00065   /* \brief the tooltip to display when the user hovers over the node in the tree */
00066   attribute AString tooltip;
00067   /* \brief should the node be hidden in the tree ? */
00068   attribute boolean hidden;
00069   /* \brief should the node name be editable in the tree ? */
00070   attribute boolean editable;
00071   /* \brief is the this node open in the tree? */
00072   attribute boolean isOpen;
00073   /* \brief the contract id of the service that owns the node */
00074   attribute AString contractid;
00075   
00076   /* drag and drop reordering helper attributes */
00077   /* \brief a comma separated list of drag types to offer for reordering */
00078   attribute AString dndDragTypes;
00079   /* \brief a comma separated list of drag types to allow to be reordered before or after */
00080   attribute AString dndAcceptNear;
00081   /* \brief a comma separated list of drag types to allow dropping into */
00082   attribute AString dndAcceptIn;
00083   
00084   /* \brief the uri of a stringbundle to use to translate the properties of this node */
00085   attribute AString stringbundle;
00086 
00087   /* \brief space separated list of property names, used to style the tree cell */
00088   attribute AString properties;
00089 
00090   
00091   // here's a subset of the W3C DOM Level 1 Core
00092   
00093   AString getAttributeNS(in AString aNamespace,
00094                          in AString aName);
00095   AString setAttributeNS(in AString aNamespace,
00096                          in AString aName,
00097                          in AString aValue);
00098   
00099   readonly attribute nsISimpleEnumerator childNodes;
00100   readonly attribute sbIServicePaneNode firstChild;
00101   readonly attribute sbIServicePaneNode lastChild;
00102   readonly attribute sbIServicePaneNode nextSibling;
00103   readonly attribute sbIServicePaneNode parentNode;
00104   readonly attribute sbIServicePaneNode previousSibling;
00105   
00106   sbIServicePaneNode appendChild (in sbIServicePaneNode aChild);
00107   sbIServicePaneNode insertBefore (in sbIServicePaneNode aNewNode,
00108                                    in sbIServicePaneNode aAdjacentNode);
00109   void removeChild (in sbIServicePaneNode aChild);
00110   void replaceChild (in sbIServicePaneNode aNewNode,
00111                      in sbIServicePaneNode aOldNode);
00112   
00113   
00114   // potential additions:
00115   // readonly attribute ownerDataSource; // like ownerDocument
00116   // boolean hasChildNodes();
00117   // AString getAttribute(in AString aName);
00118   // AString setAttribute(in AString aName, in AString aValue);
00119   // AString removeAttribute(in AString aName);
00120   // AString removeAttributeNS(in AString aNamespace, in AString aName);
00121   // some way to enumerate attributes
00122   // readonly attribute AString namespaceURI; // default attribute namespace
00123 };

00160 [scriptable, uuid(597efdd3-b564-4052-a61d-100a5bad7ad7)]
00161 interface sbIServicePaneService : nsISupports
00162 {
00166   readonly attribute nsIRDFDataSource dataSource;
00167 
00171   readonly attribute sbIServicePaneNode root;
00172 
00173   /* \brief Add a node to the tree
00174    * Create a new node and add it as a child of the specified parent. If a
00175    * child with the given id already exists then do not create it, and return
00176    * null. Otherwise return a node object.
00177    * \param aId an URN to use as the ID, or null if it should be anonymous
00178    * \param aParent the desired parent node
00179    * \param aContainer should the new node be a container
00180    * \return node object, or null if the node couldn't be created
00181    */
00182   sbIServicePaneNode addNode(in AString aId,
00183                              in sbIServicePaneNode aParent,
00184                              in boolean aContainer);
00185   
00186   /* \brief Remove a node and all its children
00187    * Remove a node from the tree and all its children and all their childen and
00188    * so on.
00189    * \param aNode the node to remove
00190    */
00191   void removeNode(in sbIServicePaneNode aNode);
00192   
00193   /* \brief Get the node object for the given id
00194    * \param aId the ID of the desired node
00195    * \return node object, or null if it couldn't be found
00196    */
00197   sbIServicePaneNode getNode(in AString aId);
00198 
00199   /* \brief Save the state of the tree to disk.
00200    * This should go away and be handled magically
00201    */
00202   void save();
00203 
00204   /* \brief Fill the context menu for the given node
00205    * \param aId the id of the node
00206    * \param aContextMenu the menu we're trying to fill
00207    * \param aParentWindow the toplevel window we're displaying in
00208    */
00209   void fillContextMenu(in AString aId,
00210                        in nsIDOMXULElement aContextMenu,
00211                        in nsIDOMWindow aParentWindow);
00212   
00213   /* I think we'll need to have this interface too:
00214   nsITreeView wrapTreeView(in nsITreeView aTreeView);
00215   it will take an existing tree-builder tree view and add some
00216   functionality that we want to have
00217   */
00218   
00219   /* drag and drop support */
00220   PRBool canDrop(in AString aID,
00221                  in nsIDragSession aDragSession,
00222                  in PRInt32 aOrientation);
00223   void onDrop(in AString aID,
00224               in nsIDragSession aDragSession,
00225               in PRInt32 aOrientation);
00226   PRBool onDragGesture(in AString aID,
00227                        out nsITransferable aTransferable);
00228 };

00235 [scriptable, uuid(a5c003f9-38e1-436a-9c0a-39718999640e)]
00236 interface sbIServicePaneModule : nsISupports
00237 {
00238   /* \brief Initialize this service pane module
00239    * This is where the module should set itself up in the tree if it hasn't
00240    * before.
00241    * \param aServicePaneService the service pane service instance
00242    */
00243   void servicePaneInit(in sbIServicePaneService aServicePaneService);
00244   
00245   /* \brief Fill the context menu for the given node
00246    * \param aNode the node that was context-clicked on
00247    * \param aContextMenu the menu we're trying to fill
00248    * \param aParentWindow the toplevel window we're displaying in
00249    */
00250   void fillContextMenu(in sbIServicePaneNode aNode,
00251                        in nsIDOMXULElement aContextMenu,
00252                        in nsIDOMWindow aParentWindow);
00253 
00254   PRBool canDrop(in sbIServicePaneNode aNode,
00255                  in nsIDragSession aDragSession,
00256                  in PRInt32 aOrientation);
00257   void onDrop(in sbIServicePaneNode aNode,
00258               in nsIDragSession aDragSession,
00259               in PRInt32 aOrientation);
00260   PRBool onDragGesture(in sbIServicePaneNode aNode,
00261                        in nsITransferable aTransferable);
00262   
00263   /* \brief optional URI of stringbundle to use to localize names of nodes
00264     associated with this module */
00265   readonly attribute AString stringbundle;
00266 };
